price: (Yaa Muhammad! Warra mushrikaatiin) “Warra shariikota gootanii Isatti dhaqqabsiiftan san mee natti argisiisaa? Dhorgamaa! (Inni shariika hin qabu). Dhugumatti, Inni Allaah injifataa, ogeessa” jedhiin.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرُونِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلۡحَقۡتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul arūniya alladhīna alḥaqtum bihi shurakāa kallā bal huwa al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
